about_the_game:
After a heart-pounding chase that pushed you to the brink, you thought the nightmare was over. But descending to the lower floor was only the beginning. Welcome to the forgotten depths—a place where darkness feels alive, and every shadow hides unimaginable horrors.

In this second chapter, delve deeper into the company’s twisted secrets, where their most terrifying creations await. Explore a world even more sinister and immersive, filled with traps, mind-bending puzzles, and monstrous mascots lurking in every corner.

What’s New in Chapter 2?

  • New Environments: Navigate a sprawling underground labyrinth, from abandoned workshops to hidden archives and forbidden zones.

  • Terrifying Encounters: Face new nightmare mascots, each with unique behaviors, abilities, and hunting styles.

  • Enhanced Gameplay: Solve intricate puzzles and use new tools to survive—but beware, every decision could seal your fate.

  • Heightened Tension: Experience an even more immersive story with pulse-pounding chase sequences and chilling revelations about the company’s dark intentions.

Will You Survive the Lower Floor?

Prepare to descend into the unknown and confront your worst nightmares. The secrets you uncover may cost you more than your sanity.

  • Processor: Core i3-8100 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030 2GB or RX 550 2GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
